author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Corporation has identified a total of 1,771 unauthorised constructions in 60 wards in its limits in 2015-16.

Under Sections 274, 283, 296 (1) (2), 297 and 447 of the Salem Corporation Act 1994, the corporation has identified unauthorised constructions in all the four zones, Suramangalam Ward Office (453 unauthorised constructions), Ammapet Ward Office (290), Kondalampatti (683) and Ammapet Ward Office (290). Notices have been served for unauthorised constructions and cases were also pending in the court.

Also, the corporation had collected a fine of Rs. 4.12 lakh from the building owners by registering cases in the court.

However, many buildings were constructed violating the norms and unauthorised structures have come up in the city.

These unauthorised structures disrupt the traffic flow causing congestion on the roads.

Also, the corporation had received 1,161 applications for construction of buildings for the year 2015-16. The corporation had permitted 1,058 applicants to proceed through which it earned revenue of Rs. 65.35 lakh.
title: 1,771 illegal constructions identified in corpn. limits
